entry.title: WIND WARNING , Onefour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Onefour AAFC 06:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: S 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
